page.title: 12CONDOVERS
page.content: { Condovers}is a scout camp and a farm. The camp site is very big,it has about 3 and a half acres of land including the woods.The woods consists mostly of saplings and shrubs as the trees have not fully grown yet.There is also a tuck shop which sells sweets and drinks both fizzy and soft. The Condovers Farm or the{Walnut Tree {Farm}is a poultry farm mostly consisting of chickens.It has a few barns and a neat little cottage as a farm-house.The farm also has a couple of horses and a dog. There is a{playscheme}which is held at Condovers in the summer months,for the children in the area.It is run by the scouts and has all kinds of things to do like abseiling,pioneering and lots more.Special buses are run there from as far away as Aveley and Stanford.
